name: Daily Routines
description:
Explore the apartment of an apocalyptic shut-in and possibly discover what the hell happened to her world! Or not, it's just a prototype.

[My entry for the 2018 Summer My First Game Jam! I followed a lot of tutorials to code this and end up with something I'm happy with, and I think at this point it is VERY evident that I need some formal education. But, I made SOMETHING, and I'm proud to have even done that considering I've never done this before.]
